content: Experimental cancer therapy ‘NeoCure’ in Phase II trials. Targeting advanced breast carcinoma.
metadata: Trial code: NC-P2, sponsor: Sunrise Pharma, results expected Q4 2025

content: Antiviral drug ‘Viraxin-B’ for respiratory viruses in Phase I. Animal studies showed reduced lung inflammation.
metadata: Lab reference: Lab-X, next milestone: 2025-06, candidate for fast-track

content: Pain management patch ‘Analge-Patch’ reformulated to minimize skin irritation. Preclinical data promising.
metadata: Formulation code: AP-NEW, tested for 12-hour release, next step: IND filing

content: Diabetes injection device integrated with real-time glucose monitor. Collaboration with MedTech Solutions.
metadata: Pilot code: DIA-Sync, user trials: Q3 2025

content: Generic antibiotic ‘Ampiclox-XYZ’ improved shelf life. Stability studies ongoing with updated excipients.
metadata: Shelf life target: 3 years, scale-up batch planned 2025-07
